categories: Category:Battles in the Allied Tion sector

nodes.text: Second Battle of the Lianna system

A battle occurred in the Lianna system during the Mandalorian Wars, where the Galactic Republic reclaimed the Lianna system in 3960 BBY before using it as a staging ground for the Battle of Malachor V.
The battle is only referenced once in 2009's The Essential Atlas. It is marked on a galactic map showing the battles of the Mandalorian Wars rather than described in prose.
